In the ruins of the trainer base, beneath mounds of cement and 
circutry  a arm punches through.  Then another, and then finally a 
scorpion tail plows through.  As the body limbs reach to the sky the 
body of thier origin blasts out of the rubble his giant wings taking 
him to the sky.  The bot was Halucigen, although un recognizable.  He 
flew up and looked to the vast destruction around him.  He didn't 
know what to do, but he felt different.  There was energy inside him 
he hadn ever felt before, but hwere did it come from....
